name: Adroit Wisdom
description: Increases INT by 15%.

name: All-Rounder
description: Increases ATK, DEF, INT and SPD by 5%.

name: Analyze
description: Increases scan values by 10%.

name: Animal Colosseum
description: Increases damage from Earth skills by 15%.

name: Aus Generics
description: Increases SPD and EVA by 25% when HP drops below 25%.

name: Backwater Camp
description: Increases damage given by 20%, but also increases damage received by 20%.

name: Battle Sense
description: Increases ATK by 50% when HP drops below 10%.

name: Blaster
description: Increases ATK by 10% and amount of HP received from absorption effects by 30%.

name: Bull's-Eye
description: Increases ACU by 15%.

name: Caledfwlch Dive
description: Increases ACU and EVA by 5%, and CRT by 10%.

name: Chaos Expert
description: Increases ATK and INT by 10%.

name: Crimson Formation
description: Increases damage from Electric and Wind skills by 10%.

name: D-Brigade
description: Increases ACU and CRT by 10%.

name: Deep Savers
description: Increases damage from Water skills by 15%.

name: Deep Sea Slumber
description: 10% chance of putting target to sleep when attacking.

name: Destiny
description: Restores 3% of Max HP and SP every turn.

name: Destroyer
description: 10% chance of instantly killing target when attacking.

name: Dragon Mode
description: Increases DEF and INT by 10%.

name: Dragon's Roar
description: Increases damage from Fire skills by 15%.

name: Dragon's Wrath
description: Increases ATK by 15%.

name: Envy
description: Increases damage done to targets by 15% if they are Mega or above.

name: Evil Heart
description: Increases amount of SP received from absorption effects by 30%.

name: Fairy Protection
description: Increases given stat boost effects by 5%.

name: Feint
description: Increases EVA by 7%.

name: Feral Pulse
description: Increases SPD by 15%.

name: Fight or Flight
description: Increases ATK by 20% when HP drops below 50%.

name: Fighter Mode
description: Increases ATK and SPD by 10%.

name: Flower Guard
description: Prevents poison.

name: Freyr
description: Increases damage from Wind and Light skills by 10%.

name: Full Functionality
description: Prevents sleep.

name: Furious Howl
description: 30% chance of instantly killing target when attacking if lower than Ultimate.

name: Gehenna
description: Reduces damage received from magic attacks by 10% and converts it to HP.

name: Gluttony
description: Reduces HP by 5% of Max HP and increases ATK by 5% every turn.

name: Greed
description: Increases amount of HP and SP received from absorption effects by 20%.

name: Haymaker
description: Increases CRT by 15%.

name: Hermitic Loner
description: Increases damage to Royal Knights by 20%.

name: High Resolution
description: Prevents dotting.

name: Holy Knight
description: Increases SPD by 10%, and damage from Fire and Light skills by 10%.

name: Holy Ring
description: Increases HP recovery effects by 20%.

name: Holy Salvation
description: Reduces damage received from species with bad affinity by 15%.

name: Immobility
description: Prevents stunning.

name: Innocent Eyes
description: Increase accuracy and evasion by 1%.

name: Ironclad Defense
description: Increases DEF by 15%.

name: Ironclad Fortification
description: Reduces damage received by 10%.

name: Justice Genome
description: Increases damage from Light skills by 15%.

name: Justice Union
description: Increases probability of combos occurring and continuing by 10%.

name: Leopard Mode
description: Increases EVA and CRT by 5%, and SPD by 10%.

name: Lust
description: Reduces damage received from physical attacks by 10% and converts it to SP.

name: Master's Disposition
description: If HP is over 50% of Max HP, a fatal attack will instead leave you with 1 HP.

name: Meditation
description: Restores 5% of Max HP every turn.

name: Menace
description: 10% chance of stunning target when attacking.

name: Metal Empire
description: Increases damage from Electric skills by 15%.

name: Millionaire
description: Increases YEN earned in battle.

name: Miracle
description: Has a 10% chance of reducing damage received by 30%.

name: Mirage Burst

name: Moon-Kissed Blade
description: Increases damage from Water and Light skills by 10%.

name: Muscle Monkey Suit
description: Reduces physical damage received by 15%.

name: Mysterious Scale
description: Decreases received stat reduction effects by 5%.

name: Mystic Protection
description: Cuts the rate of abnormal statuses received by 50%.

name: Nature Spirits
description: Increases damage from Plant skills by 15%.

name: Nightmare Soldiers
description: Increases damage from Dark skills by 15%.

name: Numbing Waves
description: Prevents paralysis.

name: Obsidian Knight

description: Restores 5% of Max SP every turn.

name: Phoenix Feathers
description: Prevents instant death.

name: Platinum Bonus
description: Increases EXP earned in battle.

name: Poison Thorns
description: 10% chance of poisoning target when attacking.

name: Pride

name: Primal Trooper

name: Royal Commando

name: Scavenge

name: Strange Dance
description: 10% chance of confusing target when attacking.

description: Reduces SP consumed by skills by 20%.

name: Supreme Focus
description: Prevents confusion.

name: Swiftness
description: Makes sure you always move first in battle.

name: Tifaret

name: To Fight Another Day
description: Makes it easier to escape from battle.
